ingredients.item: 200g Two Chicks Free Range Egg White
2 Cooks’ Ingredients Sundried Tomatoes (dried, not in oil), finely chopped
1 tbsp Waitrose Red Chilli Pesto With Tomato

instructions.step: Place the couscous and the salad onions in a heatproof bowl and pour over 75ml boiling water. Set aside for 5 minutes.
Meanwhile, lightly beat the egg whites, then stir in the prawns, peas and sundried tomatoes.
Fluff up the couscous with a fork and stir, along with the salad onions, into the omelette mix.

Heat the oil in a 20cm non-stick frying pan and cook the omelette for 5 minutes on each side until nicely browned and cooked through, adding a little extra oil to the pan if required. Cut into wedges, dot with the chilli pesto and serve.
